entry.title: Russian Soldier Recounts Shooting Civilian in Ukraine War-Crimes Trial
entry.content: Vadim Shishimarin, a 21-year-old Russian soldier, told a Kyiv courtroom he opened fire on the man while riding in a commandeered car in northeast Ukraine in late February.

entry.title: As Russia's Invasion of Ukraine Stalls, Critical Voices Emerge in Moscow
entry.content: Following Russiaâ€™s retreat from Kyiv and the northeastern city of Kharkiv, dissenting views on the war have challenged the Kremlin narrative promoted in state-controlled media.
